ComicInfo.Title: Chapter Two
ComicInfo.Summary:
Greg Pak! Diego Galindo!
Upon finding mysterious maps left behind by the deceased Bob Newby, Will takes off on his own, determined to find whatever pirate treasure is hidden near the riverbanks of Hawkins. As a heavy snow blankets the town, Lucas, Dustin, and Mike must find Will before he freezes to death!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Marc Aspinall | 1 | B | Cover B | Caspar Wijngaard | 2 | C | Cover C | Pius Bak | 3 | D | Cover D | Rafael Sarmento | 4 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-26 05:08:21. [CVDB891757]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Caspar Wijngaard, Marc Aspinall, Pius Bak, Rafael Sarmento
ComicInfo.Characters: Dustin Henderson, Jonathan Byers, Joyce Byers, Lucas Sinclair, Mike Wheeler, Scott Clarke, Will Byers
